!::Graphical Issues Solved::!
For the people that have some graphical issues, you just install the game properly and then go to the launcher and right click, properties, compatibility, and just "check" the visual definitions boxes. For a friend of mine it solved the Problem :D He was running win7.
And seeding now, tnks for the upload!
hate it how people put more than one game in one zip file. now its even worse! its an exe file! DAMN SHIT I ONLY WANT HOTD 1!

graphical issues with HOD3 occur due to the lack of system detection which is typical of this type of game installation ie hacked and zipped, some settings are stuck on the hackers preferences, hence when you use them they dont quite work as your system is different. Its just laziness on part of the hacker. Sometimes you can edit the .ini files or use .dll from your other games. But this version of HOD3 will have very limited graphics. ie below 1080 x 782
Works fine in Windows 7 64-bit.  Thanks.
